FAQ for This Card

Q148

July 11, 2025 Updated

What does "choose 1 enemy Unit whose Lv. is equal to or lower than this Unit" mean?

It means you determine the Lv. of this Unit paired with a Pilot, then choose a Unit whose Lv. is equal to or less than that Lv.
Example: If this Unit paired with a Pilot is Lv.6, choose an enemy Unit whose Lv. is 6 or lower.
